Ecliniq needs access to your location to show nearby hospitals and provide better services.
Ecliniq needs access to your location to show nearby hospitals and provide better services.
Ecliniq needs access to speech recognition for searching health files.
Ecliniq needs access to your microphone for voice search.
Ecliniq needs access to your camera to take photos of your health documents and medical records.
Ecliniq needs access to your photo library to select and upload health documents, medical records, and images.
Ecliniq needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
Ecliniq needs access to the local network to discover and connect to devices.
Ecliniq needs access to Bluetooth to connect with health monitoring devices.
Ecliniq needs access to Bluetooth to connect with health monitoring devices.
Ecliniq needs access to your contacts to help you share health information with family members or doctors.
Ecliniq needs access to your calendar to schedule and manage medical appointments.
Ecliniq needs access to reminders to help you remember medication schedules and appointments.
Ecliniq needs access to your health data to provide personalized health insights.
Ecliniq needs permission to update your health data with new records.
Ecliniq uses Face ID to securely authenticate and protect your health information.
